tool_description: This API is built on top of Algolia Search's API. It enables developers to access HN (Hacker News) data programmatically using a REST API. This documentation describes how to request data from the API and how to interpret the response.
name: HN Search
title: HN Search

api_list.name: Items
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hn-search.p.rapidapi.com/items/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hn-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hn-search.p.rapidapi.com/items/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hn-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hn-search.p.rapidapi.com/users/{username}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hn-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search by Date

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: ilter on a specific tag. Available tags: story comment poll pollop show_hn ask_hn author_:USERNAME story_:ID

optional_parameters.name: numericFilters
optional_parameters.description: filter on a specific numerical condition (<, <=, =, > or >). Available numerical fields: created_at_i points num_comments
